page.title: 03An electronic dream house
page.content: As we were walking along the path,we saw{Mr. Hickman}driving an antique car. His front door had a security system. We went through to the back garden. We sat down and asked him questions about the house. We found out that the house cost{Â£1,500,000}and that it has{79 rooms.} His back garden has pop up water sprinklers, a putting green and croquet. His favourite invention is the{Black and Decker {workmate.} The house has four floors. He has about five or six cars. When we had asked all the questions we went inside. There were various insects spread around the place. He has a swimming pool with a jacuzzi. He had a music room with a grand piano and an expensive electric toy called a plasma globe. My view of{Mr. Hickman is a {very hospitable gentleman.
